thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: Barb Stras

author: Barb Stras
title: Barb Stras
text: Josh was amazing. He had a very clean vehicle that accommodated 6 adults. His microphone REALLY helped. He was prepared, informative, helpful, humorous and an overall delight! This was a terrific tour with a well prepared guide. **Don't hesitate to book a tour with Josh!** We went to a great little spot for lunch, visited 'out of the way' places and even hiked into the woods to look into a volcanic steam vent and walk into and through a lava tube. It was an excellent experience for all of us! What a pleasure to be picked up at the cruise ship terminal and whisked away for a wonderful day.
